bssearchadmin-desc: Description text for title attribute in menu link
bs-extendedsearch-search-input-placehold: Placeholder text within the search input field
bs-extendedsearch-search-input-aria-labe: Aria-label for search box for screenreader compatibility
bs-extendedsearch-source-label-wikipage: Label for heading of a section that lists hits from the source 'wikipage'
bs-extendedsearch-source-label-specialpa: Label for heading of a section that lists hits from the source 'specialpage'
bs-extendedsearch-source-label-repofile: Label for heading of a section that lists hits from the source 'repofile'
bs-extendedsearch-source-label-user:
Label for heading of a section that lists hits from the source 'user'
{{Identical|User}}
bs-extendedsearch-admin-heading-backend: Label for heading of a section that lists information about the local backend on Special:SearchAdmin.
bs-extendedsearch-admin-label-error:
Label for an error message on Special:SearchAdmin
{{Identical|Error}}
bs-extendedsearch-admin-label-all-docume: Label for information about the nubmer of documents in the index on Special:SearchAdmin
bs-extendedsearch-admin-heading-sources:
Label for heading of a section that lists information about the sources within a specific backend on Special:SearchAdmin
{{Identical|Source}}
bs-extendedsearch-admin-heading-sources-: Label for field that reports the number of documents within a specific source on Special:SearchAdmin
bs-extendedsearch-admin-heading-pendingu: Label for field that reports the number of pending update jobs for a specific source on Special:SearchAdmin
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-hitcount:
Text showing how many hits search request has returned.
 $1 - number of hits, $2 - search term

Text showing approximately how many hits search has returned. 
 $1 - number of hits, $2 - search term
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-addfilte: Title for the add filter dialog
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-e: Label for the extension field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-n:
Label for the namespace_text field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
{{Identical|Namespace}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-t: Label for the tags field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-c: Label for the categories field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-t:
Label for the type pseudo-field in the filter when its empty (nothing selected)
{{Identicla|Type}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-e: Label for the extension field in the filter values are selected
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-n:
Label for the namespace_text field in the filter values are selected
{{Identical|Namespace}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-t: Label for the tags field in the filter values are selected
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-c:
Label for the categories field in the filter values are selected
{{Identical|Category}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-t:
Label for the type pseudo-field in the filter values are selected
{{Identical|Type}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-n: Text that appears in the filter popup when no options are available
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-n:
Label for the namespace field in the result
{{Identical|Namespace}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-c:
Label for the category field in the result
{{Identical|Category}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-a: Label for the author field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-s: Label for the sections field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-c: Label for the created time field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-m: Label for the modified time field in the result
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-n: Text that is diplayed when search has yielded no results
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-pagesize: Title label for PageSize dialog, showing options for results per page
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-sort-ord: Label for radio button for ascending sort order
Label for radio button for descending sort order
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-dialog-b:
Label for dialog button with action cancel
{{Identical|Cancel}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-options-: Label for confirmation button in search options dialog with apply changes action
Label for the page size option in search options dialog. This options sets how many results will be displayed per page.
Label for the sort by option in search options dialog. This options sets the field results are sorted by
Label for the sort order option in search options dialog. This options sets the order of sorting - asc or desc
bs-extendedsearch-autocomplete-result-pr: Message displaying in autocomplete popup when search yielded no direct results. Fuzzy matches still may exist
bs-extendedsearch-autocomplete-result-ty:
Label showing the type of the results. $1 - type of result
{{Identical|Type}}
bs-extendedsearch-autocomplete-result-to: Label for top matches group in autocomplete results. These results are exact or very close matches to the search term
bs-extendedsearch-autocomplete-result-se: Label for fuzzy matches in autocomplete results. These results do not contain search term or are not in correct namespace, but still may be relevant (did you mean?)
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-h: Text showing when user has arrived to Special:BSSearchCenter directly, not via search bar. Text indicates that something must be typed in the search bar
bs-extendedsearch-searchcenter-filter-or:
Label for OR value in the switch indicating whether and OR or AND filter query should be executed
{{Identical|Or}}
bs-extendedsearch-searchcenter-filter-an: Label for AND value in the switch indicating whether and OR or AND filter query should be executed
bs-extendedsearch-searchcenter-sort-fiel:
Label for sort by field name.
{{Identical|Name}}
Label for sort by field modified time
Label for sort by field created time

Label for sort by field size
{{Identical|Size}}

Label for sort by field namespace
{{Identical|Namespace}}
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-h: Label for filter when there are more values than can be shown. This label indicates how many more values are hidden. $1 - number of hidden values
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-e: Generic message text when query execution produced an error
bs-extendedsearch-autocomplete-create-pa: Text for the link offering to create non-existing page. $1 - prefixed name of the page
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-hitcount: Message showing when search term has been replaced due to typo detected. $1 - new term, $2 - original term, $3 - number of hits for original term
Message showing when a typo in the search term is suspected, offering alternative term to search for. $1 - alternative term, $2 - number of hits for alternative term
bs-extendedsearch-loadmore-label: Label for button that loads further results for search request
bs-extendedsearch-loadmore-error: Text showing in the load more button when no more results can be loaded due to an error
bs-extendedsearch-filter-label-count-onl:
{{optional}}
Label message for mobile view - showing only number of selected filter options. $1 - number of selected filter options
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-t: Label showing the type of the results.
bs-extendedsearch-source-type-repofile-l: Label for Local file source type
bs-extendedsearch-source-type-specialpag: Label for Special page source type
bs-extendedsearch-result-relevance-relev: Tooltip text for button enabling users to increase relevance (score) of a result for them
bs-extendedsearch-result-relevance-not-r: Tooltip text for button enabling users to decrease relevance (score) of a result for them
bs-extendedsearch-autocomplete-fulltext-: Text for the button leading to SearchCenter special page - equivalent to user pressing enter key
prefs-extendedsearch: Label for the ExtendedSearch tab in user preferences
bs-extendedsearch-user-preferred-namespa: Label for the field selecting which namespaces are preferred for the user, those are ranked higher in results
bs-extendedsearch-pref-external-file-pat: Label for the field selecting which external file paths should be indexed
Label for field containing physical path to the folder
Label for field containing URL path folder can be reached through
Help message for physical path input field
Help message for url prefix input field
Label for the field selecting which external file paths should have what exclude regular expression pattern
Error message when the given regular expression pattern is not valid
Label for field containing an exclude regular expression pattern for a given path to a folder
Help message for exclude regular expression pattern for physical path input field
bs-extendedsearch-autocomplete-modified-: Label for last modified time in autocomplete. $1 - last modified timestamp (formatted)
bs-extendedseach-wikipage-section-more-t: Text to show when there are more sections in a wikipage than can be showed. $1 - number of sections not shown
bs-extendedsearch-pref-compact-ac-paths: Label for the field selecting whether to use simple autocomplete popup
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-r: Label for the field in the result showing links to pages that redirect to this page
bs-extendedsearch-redirect-target-label: Label for the redirect target page anchor in results that are redirect pages
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-filter-p: Label for the page language filter when its empty (nothing selected)
Label for the page language filter when there are values selected
bs-extendedsearch-wikipage-title-origina: Text displaying original page title if page display title differs from page title. $1 - Original page title
bs-extendedsearch-pref-auto-set-lang-fil: Label for the config field configuring if the language filter should automatically be set based on user language
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-create-p: Text for the link offering to create non-existing page. $1 - prefixed name of the page
bs-extendedsearch-privacy-transparency-c: Message for item in BlueSpicePrivacy when exporting users mentions on a page. $1 - list of mentions
bs-extendedsearch-privacy-transparency-h:
{{optional}}
Message for item in BlueSpicePrivacy when exporting individual entries from search history. $1 - search term, $2 - number of times searched
Message for item in BlueSpicePrivacy when exporting user search history. $1 - conflated list of search terms
bs-extendedsearch-privacy-transparency-r: Message for item in BlueSpicePrivacy when exporting user's relevant pages. $1 - number of relevant pages, $2 - user that this data is generated for (used only for gender determination)
bs-extendedsearch-filter-add-button-labe: Tooltip text for a button that add a new filter to the search
bs-extendedsearch-options-button-label: Tooltip text for a button that opens search options dialog
bs-extendedsearch-export-button-label: Tooltip text for a button that opens a dialog to export the search results
bs-extendedsearch-flyout-similar-pages-t: Title for the flyout section showing pages similar to the current page
bs-extendedsearch-flyout-similar-pages-e: Text for the flyout section when there are no similar pages available
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-f: Only for pages in NS_FILE. Label for the field in the result showing links to pages that use this file.
bs-extendedsearch-tagsearch-searchfield-: Placeholder text for the search field
bs-extendedsearch-tagsearch-parser-error: Error message text when given search result type is invalid. $1 - name of the given type
bs-extendedsearch-tagsearch-ve-tagsearch: Title of VE inspector for TagSearch tag
Description of the purpose of TagSearch tag
bs-extendedsearch-collection-type-search:
Label for source type "searchhistory" in entry field "type"
{{Identical|Search history}}
bs-extendedsearch-suggest-operator:
Suggestion message for suggested search operators.
$1 - suggested query
bs-extendedsearch-autocomplete-popup-qui:
Notice when a quiet subpage filter is active. 
$1 - page title of the filter
Label for the button that clears the quiet subpage filter
bs-extendedsearch-searchbar-master-filte:
Tooltip for the quiet subpage filter pill in the search input field.
$1 - page title of the filter
